title: Help me, I am scared but kinda happy at the same time, Mostly scared!
body: My account was hacked, I know this because I have champions that i never purchased and I have 3257 RP and I have comments on threads that i never posted. I have changed my password, and I am pretty confident that they will not regain access to my account. How do I make absolutely sure nobody gets my account again? I am very scared because I have worked on this account for 3 years!

replies.body:
Hello.
I am a LoL player, and i've played it for a year. i love the game and play it alot in my free time, infact it's like a part of me. I currently go to school. Today, when i came back home i was excited to play. ( I had just bought rp) I start a game and then i see that i am in game. Im thinking: What is going on? I go to the game and see that someone is on my account playing AP Riven in ranked and just trolling. everyone keeps flaming me and i keep saying "It wasn't me i swear!" I have not given out my account information to anybody. i really don't want to get banned. Please help! Ps: i am not banned but everyone said that they will report me. Much love..         //Mohammed

To add to this, an extra layer of security you can add is by enabling *two step verification* to the email associated with your account if it's available. This will mean that even if someone cracks the password to your email in an attempt to steal your League account, they'll need to access the phone you associated with your email to gain access.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Hello dear Rioter, 
I find this person's story to be extremely suspicious and fishy. If you read my post above you will see why. Please check into it further.
